name: Locked Maze (rameneatsnoodles)
description: Emma is trapped in a haunted maze, with ghosts and traps waiting to end her life. Help her escape by choosing the right keys to go through the right door. The color of the key must match the color of the door to go through, and each key is one use only, so choose wisely! Use the arrow keys to move Emma to safety, and be careful, you only have 3 health points to survive.
